pullRequest.title: Improve UfsIOBench and HdfsValidationTool
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR contains a few improvements to the HDFS tools:

Set process type of UfsIOBench as JOB_WORKER as it always runs in a job, invoked by a job worker.
Added description to each of the TaskResult from HdfsValidationTool. Each description corresponds to what the validation task did.
Removed UfsContractTest from HdfsValidationTool, as we only care about the accessibility of the UFS path, not all possible UFS operations.
Catch more exceptions now in the tools.
